summary: A save game just as description says and a Work in progress
descriptionHtml:
I have always wanted to have a complete 100 save of Skyrim  but none of the saves in this site satisfied me so I made my own save with a complete different approach.For Example I always hated dark brotherhood(at least in skyrim) so I destroyed them.I also roleplay  as a moralist in most RPGs so I tried to be a Paladin whenever I got the chance, that includes Vaermina,Namira,Hircine,Clavicus Vile and obviously Dark brotherhood quests.
Race: Lvl81 Male Altmer
Name: Erandil
Political Faction: Imperial Legion
Mods used:Only USLEEP(unofficial skyrim legendary edition patch) and SkyUI
REQUIRES ALL DLCs
NOTE:I didn't build hearthfire houses because I feel you should be able to choose every part and build it yourself same as adoption and Marriage
author: sl666
